title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1584/89 of 7 June 1989 concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
header:
8.6.1989 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 156/15
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1584/89
of 7 June 1989
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN codes indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 June 1989.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2)  OJ No L 148, 1. 6. 1989, p. 1.
ANNEX
Description of the goods CN code classification Reasons
(1) (2) (3)
1. Set of garments for women or girls put up for retail sale, consisting of:
— a lightweight knitted garment (55 % man-made fibres and 45 % cotton) designed to be worn next to the body, which falls well short of the waist, covers the chest and the upper part of the back, has no sleeves and has a low-cut neckline at the front. This garment has an elastic band (2,5 cm in width) at the base. (See photo 431 A in the Appendix (1))
— briefs of the same fabric, composition and colour as the upper garment. (See photo 431 B in the Appendix (1))
2. Lightweight, knitted, sleeveless garment (100 % cotton) for women or girls and designed to be worn next to the body, falling well short of the waist, covering the chest and with a low-cut neckline at the front and back. This garment has two darts at the front of approximately 5 cm extending from the base which is slightly gathered and has an elastic band (approximately 1,5 cm wide). (See photo 432 in the Appendix (1))
(1)  The photographs are merely of an illustrative nature.
Appendix
